abstract.t: This document describes a method of building an alternative, logicaltopology for managing Endpoint Identifier to Routing Locator mappingsusing the Locator/ID Separation Protocol. The logical network isbuilt as an overlay on the public Internet using existingtechnologies and tools, specifically the Border Gateway Protocol andthe Generic Routing Encapsulation. An important design goal forLISP+ALT is to allow for the relatively easy deployment of anefficient mapping system while minimizing changes to existinghardware and software.
